dark mode: Camp backgrounds will match with the mode: nighttime for dark mode and daytime for light mode.
custom cursor: The cursor will be replaced with a cat paw.
keybinds: Enables certian keybinds to be used throughout the menus for quick navigation.
shaders: This will add a shading layer onto the cat sprites.
gore: Allow mild gore and blood in patrol artwork
Mild gore and blood will be allowed in the artwork displayed alongside patrols.
discord: Discord will show info about your Clan, including your Clan name
check_for_updates: Automatically checks for updates on startup
show_changelog: Shows the changelog of the latest release on startup
special_dates: Certain changes may be made to the game on special days such as April Fools
random relation: Randomize relationship values when creating Clan
Clan founder cats will start the game with established relationships.
fullscreen: Will make the game fullscreen, with some black borders (for now)
